entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:32 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 07:54 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Wind Chill: -10
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
